scripts.serve:overwrite: yarn run serve:stop && pm2 delete jsore && dotenv -e envs/.env pm2 start -- src/index.js --name 'jsore'
scripts.watch:dev: nodemon -e js,html,css,json --watch dist --watch src --exec yarn run watch:dev:serve
scripts.watch:existing: nodemon --watch dist/index.html --watch dist/styles.css --watch routes/* --watch src/index.js --exec yarn run serve:overwrite
